The community of students, faculty and staff in the history department is bound together in the pursuit of educational excellence and ground-breaking research. Our students are able to pursue their interests in historical scholarship in a unique and enriching environment, utilizing the many resources available within the classroom, the NYU campus, and the greater New York City metropolitan area.
